results.name: a(n) = least k such that the remainder of 13^k divided by k is n.
link: Fausto A. C. Cariboni, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 with -1 for large entries where a(n) has not yet been found, Oct 31 2016 [With 207 new terms, this supersedes the earlier table from Robert G. Wilson v et al.]
Robert G. Wilson v et al., Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 with -1 for large entries where a(n) has not yet been found, Feb 06 2007; Nov 30 2010.
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jan 30 2007
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 06 2007
